text: Khloé Kardashian is days away from becoming a mother for the first time. The reality star and designer shared some thoughts about her pregnancy and impending deep dive into motherhood in a post on her app this week. ` ` I can't believe my little girl will be here soon! These past nine months have flown by, and I've loved every minute of it,'' she wrote. ` ` After my first trimester everything has been a breeze,'' she added, referencing the early struggles in her pregnancy that she documented on Keeping Up With the Kardashians.
